title: Bellini Nicotine Pouches By Zyn
description: TRY ZYN BELLINI NICOTINE POUCHES Bellini Nicotine Pouches by ZYN is inspired by the popular Italian cocktail. A refreshing taste of peach with nuances of fruit tea and green grapes. KEY FEATURES: Peach and grape flavoured nicotine pouches Excellent for quitting smoking Effective nicotine satisfaction Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free Suitable for all environments Fits comfortably under your lip MORE ABOUT FRUITY FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES The all-white nicotine pouches deliver an Italian cocktail feeling of enjoying a drink on a warm sunny day by the Mediterranean Sea. With a burst of peach, fruit tea and green grape flavours, providing you with an irresistible flavour as well as an efficient nicotine kick. MORE ABOUT NICOTINE POUCHES Zyn's tobacco-free nicotine pouches allow you to have your nicotine buzz, whenever and wherever you choose. Each pouch fits securely under your lip, offering you a discreet and effective nicotine experience. Zyn's pouches are available in range of flavours and strengths, so make sure you check out the rest of the range. PACKAGE CONTENTS: 20 x Zyn Bellini Nicotine Pouches Brand Name: Zyn Product Type: Nicotine Pouches Pouch Format: Mini Strength: Mild Nicotine per Pouch (mg/pouch) 3 MG 6MG Flavour Name: Citrus Mini Flavour: Lemon and Lime Pouches per can: 20 Shipping from: London, UK
